global_attributes.comment: Deployment summary: This glider was deployed 2019-12-12 22:47:17 UTC and recovered 2020-03-02 06:49:00 UTC. It was initially deployed to the Frontal Zone 1 (FZ-1) line but exhibited poor steering performance shortly after deployment so it was re-assigned to the Slope Sea 1 (SS-1) line. The glider continued to exhibit poor steering ability throughout the deployment and often overshot waypoints or failed to maintain the SS-1 trackline. The DVL was disabled 2020-02-04 to conserve battery power. Otherwise, this was a relatively normal deployment.

platform.long_name: OOI Coastal Pioneer Slocum Glider cp_388
